name: Ducking Ducks
description:
Welcome to Ducking Ducks!

This game is about a duck trying to dodge logs being flung at him. This sounds easy at first but be aware... the logs get thrown harder making them faster than ever the more you progress!

To play the game simply use W A S D and Space. W A S and D will move your duck around the map and Space will enter the duck in a state in which he cannot be hit by the logs. This only lasts for one second!
